code:
flowchart TD
    Start((Start)) --> Auth[Login to System]
    Auth --> Role{User Role?}
    
    Role -- Lawyer --> CreateCase[Create New Case]
    Role -- Staff --> Search[Search Existing Case]
    
    CreateCase --> AddClient[Add/Select Client]
    AddClient --> Assign[Assign Lawyer]
    Assign --> OpenStatus[Set Status: OPEN]
    
    subgraph Execution Phase
        OpenStatus --> Docs[Upload Evidence/Docs]
        Docs --> Schedule[Schedule Hearing]
        Schedule --> Hearing{Hearing Outcome?}
        
        Hearing -- Adjourned --> Reschedule[Reschedule Hearing]
        Reschedule --> Schedule
        
        Hearing -- Verdict Reached --> UpdateStatus[Set Status: VERDICT/CLOSED]
    end
    
    UpdateStatus --> Billing[Initiate Billing]
    
    subgraph Billing Phase
        Billing --> SelectStrat{Select Strategy}
        SelectStrat -- "Hourly" --> CalcHourly[Calculate Hours * Rate]
        SelectStrat -- "Flat Fee" --> CalcFlat[Apply Flat Fee]
        
        CalcHourly --> GenInv[Generate Invoice]
        CalcFlat --> GenInv
        
        GenInv --> SendClient[Send to Client]
        SendClient --> Payment{Payment Received?}
        Payment -- No --> Reminder[Send Reminder]
        Payment -- Yes --> Archive[Archive Case]
    end
    
    Archive --> Stop((End))
    Reminder --> SendClient
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
